definition: this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)

sentences.english: McDonald's and KFC use this kind of international business strategy to make their profit.
sentences.chinese: 麥當勞和肯得及就是利用這種國際化策略來盈利的。

sentences.english: But it was this sense of failure that made him determined to succeed in his new life.
sentences.chinese: 但就是這種失敗感使他決心在新的生活中取得成功。

sentences.english: Cheng says her mother was an advocate of this style of clothing.
sentences.chinese: 沈婆婆說她母親是這種服裝的支持者。

sentences.english: Some problems concerned with the mast cells in the cardiac wall were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中對心壁內這種細胞的有關問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: The terminal is used in conjunction with a photographic typesetter.
sentences.chinese: 這種終端與照相排版機一起使用。

sentences.english: Research exceeds a general designation of science and technology below cold condition this kind to learn for microtherm .
sentences.chinese: 探究這種超冷狀態下的科學技術統稱爲低溫學。

sentences.english: This feels like the perfect place for me right now.
sentences.chinese: 這種感覺就像那個完美的地方對我一樣。

sentences.english: But as a private individual, I just ignore such people.
sentences.chinese: 但如果我是作爲個人，對這種人我就根本不予理睬。

sentences.english: It was in this context that international support and scrutiny were critical.
sentences.chinese: 正因爲是在這種情況下，國際援助和監督才很重要。

sentences.english: This is the color of hopefulness, and of our connection to nature.
sentences.chinese: 這種顏色代表着希望，以及我們和自然的關聯。

sentences.english: It's great that we're seeing such community spirit sweeping the nation.
sentences.chinese: 這種社區精神遍及全英，真讓人高興。

sentences.english: Such machines are called space rockets.
sentences.chinese: 這種機器就稱爲宇宙火箭。

sentences.english: It is also named green architecture of city cave-house.
sentences.chinese: 這種建築也可稱爲“城市窯洞”式綠色建築。

sentences.english: As you can see, there are some consequences with the current arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 正如您所看到的，當前這種安排還存有許多問題。

sentences.english: This pesticide is diluted with water and applied directly to the fields.
sentences.chinese: 這種殺蟲劑用水稀釋後直接施用在田裏。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
every kind of/all kinds of/various kinds
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
